channel.title: Brancha Blog
channel.description: Insights and advice for service business owners on building a strong online presence and growing their business.

item.title: Customers Were Afraid of Wasting Their Time
item.description: People were interested in the service, but because the process was unclear, they hesitated to contact. The fear was not about money. It was about time.
item.dc:creator: Brancha

item.title: The Fake 1-Star Reviews That Almost Destroyed Our Restaurant
item.description: A Hyderabad restaurant was attacked with fake one-star reviews. Revenue collapsed, Google refused quick help, and the owner had to fight back smartly.
item.dc:creator: Brancha

item.title: Customers Were Not Sure If You Were Nearby
item.description: Customers searched for services near them, but unclear location details made them unsure. Instead of taking the risk, they chose businesses with clearer directions.
item.dc:creator: Brancha
